review: i get less and less enamored with this game as i go  the skill tree is locked to allow you minimal choices you are not allowed to specialize or customize beyond a single choice  the party makeup as well one of the most fun bits was when two people split off and had to fight alone  i like rpg and party games because you get to make choices that matter play in different ways and there just isnt much of that once you get under the hood of this game
